name: Chinese New Year - mahjong tile majong games free
name_original: Chinese New Year - mahjong tile majong games free
description:
Do you want to play the best Chinese New Year Mahjong game?

Switch and match mahjong tiles, jewels, coins, lanterns and lucky charms for Chinese New Year.

Drop gems and crush ice in this epic game full of color for kids, girls and all ages!

Have fun playing the top match 3 puzzle game today!!
